remarks: Closure law for a ring homomorphism.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 3-Jan-2011.)
statement:
rnghomf.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
rnghomf.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
rnghomf.3 $e |- J = ( 1st ` S ) $.
rnghomf.4 $e |- Y = ran J $.
rngohomcl $p |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps /\ F e. ( R RngHom S ) ) /\ A e. X ) -> ( F ` A ) e. Y ) $.
